3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Tania Seabock - Welcome to this meticulously maintained home w/ beautiful views! This home has 3 bedrooms, 3 remodeled bathrooms, remodeled kitchen, a living room w/ a remodeled gas-lit fireplace, a dining room, a separate family room, 2 car garage & a stand-up crawl space basement w/ storage. The main level was remodeled in 2019 showcasing a new open floor plan. The kitchen has top of the line built-in appliances & custom cabinetry, all 3 bathrooms are new, sleek & modern. Backyard is beautifully landscaped w/ great attention to detail, color, & composition. You'll see that the placement of the succulents, flowers & other plants are grouped by color & texture. The backyard seating is welcoming for entertainment & must-see panoramic Bay views. Remodel was done w/ permits by professional architects, designers & landscape architects w/ great attention to detail & quality. Smart home devices are featured throughout the property, including thermostats, light switches, doorbell, camera & fire alarms. Nestled in a quiet area, this home offers tranquility & privacy, being just minutes away from downtown Montclair where you can find restaurants, cafes, shopping, grocery stores, Sunday Farmers Market, Transbay bus to San Francisco & a 10 min drive to the Rockridge BART!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Kim A Cole - 510-967-9181 - This dramatic and light-filled mid-century home combines the very best of Montclair. Sweeping hill and bay views from a perch among the trees forms your retreat; the life of Montclair Village, just 800 feet from your backyard, provides your connection and convenience.Coffee and bagels, drinks and dinner, farmers’ market and supermarket — it’s out of sight, but so close. The home features open concept living upstairs with vaulted ceilings, mid-century built-ins and floor to ceiling windows looking toward the Bay. Three large bedrooms are on one downstairs level. The primary suite includes a bonus sunroom perfect for an office, yoga and meditation room, or read-a-book hideaway.For buyers sensitive to fluctuating interest rates, there is an assumable loan.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Stacey E Isaacs - 415-420-6992 - Close to the Village with stunning South Bay views, this Traditional beauty with mid-century modern flare is a showstopper. Soaring ceilings, hardwood floors, flawless floor-plan, expansive decks, garden patio and seamless indoor/outdoor flow set the stage for your East Bay dreams to come true. The skylit foyer opens to the great-room with fireplace and water views for miles from the generous deck. Adjacent dining room is  just the right place to entertain family & friends. The open kitchen was recently updated with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, Tiffany Blue cabinetry, pantry and convenient breakfast bar.  Light filled breakfast nook opens to the front patio and garden. Three bedrooms, including the Primary suite with deck access and two full baths complete this level. Downstairs boasts a spacious family room fully equipped for movie nights. Second fireplace, wet-bar, and access to the lower deck keep this room in high demand year-round.  Fourth bedroom with full bath on this level provides a private retreat. Laundry, mud-room/kitchenette with side entrance and a bonus room for use as an office or hobby room add convenience and unlimited possibilities! Two-car garage, owned solar, ample storage, and numerous upgrades... 6047 Snake Rd is rare find!

Open Homes Photography measurement does not include partially finished 'bonus room' on lower level that is staged as an office. Neither Compass nor listing agent has or will very square footage of home or lot.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Laura Martell - Agt: 415-948-1282 - Incredible home in the heart of Montclair, 3 bed/3 bath house that boasts breathtaking views of the city skyline. This wonderful home offers ultimate privacy!Stepping inside, you’re greeted by an abundance of natural light flooding the entire home. The first floor has charming built-ins creating a fantastic office/library. The open layout of the second floor seamlessly connects the living room and dining room. The breakfast nook off the kitchen is the perfect area to enjoy meals and soak in the view. The family room on the second level is a great area for entertaining/movie nights. One of the many highlights of this home are the balconies stretching across the second/third floors with panoramic vistas of the surrounding landscape. Experience indoor-outdoor living at its finest as you transition to the expansive backyard with a grand gazebo—an ideal spot for enjoying Oakland’s unbeatable weather.  An attached garage with storage integrates convenience and practicality into your new lifestyle.  Open Sat & Sun 2-4.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Paul Wong - 510-918-8486 - More than meets the eye.  Discover a rarity in the Montclair neighborhood… a spacious, well-appointed home on an expansive level lot that is truly just minutes from the Village. This contemporary home delivers all of those things & much more. Nicely setback from the road, with garage & driveway parking out front, step through a serene front garden into a rambling oasis, inside & out. The main level features newly refinished hardwoods, incredible natural light, fireplace, & an easy flow between the living, dining, sunroom & chef’s kitchen, complete with Viking appliances. 3 bedrooms & 1.5 baths comprise the main level, while downstairs, there is even more to love… an enclosed, spacious junior suite, full laundry room, & wine cellar! Outside - a slice of heaven - flourishing, producing garden spaces, a fire pit for entertaining, & a detached workshop with ADU potential. Solar energy is paid and owned with back up battery.  One block from Montclair Park & moments from the heart of the village, known for its wonderful shops & small town vibes - this one is a treasure!
Confidential Remarks: Please contact Paul at 510-918-8486 or Eve at 510-915-9111 to set up appointment.  Owners need 2 hours notice. Square footage of home and lot size advertised in the MLS will not be verified or guaranteed by Sellers or Listing Agent, Bedroom count differs from public record. Solar is paid and owned. OFFERS: Reviewed Tuesday 10/17 by 2pm

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Eileen Townsend - Cell: 510-725-7422 - Will you have morning coffee amidst cascading wildflowers at the garden perch overlooking a 3-Bridge View? Or will it be wine at sunset, taking in City Lights from your primary suite IPE deck? At 5901 Mazuela, every day feels like a getaway. Wake up warmed by the romantic woodstove in your Tahoe-inspired, Cathedral-ceilinged primary suite – a full floor of comforts: sitting room, dressing room, spa bath, and delicious views pouring through a west-facing window-wall. On the main floor, friends and family gather in a classy chef’s kitchen, the enjoyment spilling into a grand great room, through another window-wall, onto another expansive view-facing deck. Children and pets, lawn and gardens thrive in the level yard. There’s room for everyone with three mainfloor bedrooms & renovated full bath; one room perfect for WFH, open to front patio and your morning terrace garden. Lower level has oversized garage and in-law studio easy to envision enlarged within existing space to a larger apartment (plans available). Your refreshed, 4+ bedroom, 3 full bath home, plus in-law suite, has new HVAC & central air, and is wired with fiber-optics. Welcome home.OPEN SAT-SUN 9/30 & 10/1, 2 - 4:30 pm.
Confidential Remarks: OFFERS Wednesday 10/4 by 4 pm. Show main house anytime. ADU can be shown 10am-6pm M-F, 9 am-6pm Sat-Sun. At other times, ADU requirs appointment. CALL-TXT LA. There are two entrances to this property -- the front on Mazuela Drive (one lot north of Colton Blvd), or via the alley in the rear, where garage and paved off-street parking have been added. Supra is on front door. To access from the rear, turn from Colton onto Mendoza, then make an immediate right turn into the alley, which ends at this lot's parking area and garage. If entering from rear, there are stairs up to the deck which wraps around to front patio, and stairs through the gate on the garage side of the house also leading to front patio.  Disclosures posted and available here: https://app.disclosures.io/link/5901-Mazuela-Drive-t1zbs0jw. Pest = 0 Section 1.  Lot SF differs from tax record -- there was a lotline adjustment recorded 9/2023. Garage addition, most renos, and Jr. ADU are permitted.
Directions to Property: Colton to Mazuela OR Colton to Mendoza to R alley.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Chet M Gohd - 925-330-1110 - Welcome to this impeccably updated and stylish home ideally located in the highly sought-after Piedmont Side of Montclair. Upon entering, you'll be captivated by the thoughtfully designed interior, meticulously updated for today's contemporary living. The spacious living areas emanate warmth and comfort, accompanied by serene hill views that create a calming ambiance. The recently renovated kitchen is a culinary enthusiast's dream, featuring new stainless appliances and quartz countertops, adding a touch of modern sophistication.Stepping outside, you'll discover a magical oasis within the custom landscaped yard, complete with meandering paths and cozy resting areas. This idyllic setting provides the perfect backdrop for outdoor relaxation and entertaining, allowing you to fully embrace the beauty of your surroundings.The generously sized bedrooms on the main level offer flexible space, while downstairs, the newly developed primary suite awaits, providing a luxurious sanctuary for unwinding and rejuvenating. Plus, the convenience of interior access from the garage adds to the home's functionality.Enjoy the added benefit of a short stroll to the quaint Montclair shopping village, where charming boutiques, inviting cafes, and a vibrant atmosphere await. Don't miss this one!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Patricia Bennett - 510-387-1773 - Welcome to 5833 Colton Blvd a lovely Mid Century single family home. Conveniently located in the desirable Oakland Hills, the Montclair neighborhood is blocks from shopping, dining, transportation and many conveniences. This home offers a wonderful floorplan with abundant natural light and stunning hillside and Bay views via the many windows. The Bay view is framed by lush hills from the large, combined living/dining room with a pellet fireplace and an updated galley-style eat-in kitchen. This main level features two bedrooms, a primary bedroom with full bath and the other provides access to the large deck. There is a large additional storage/workspace with laundry accessible through a lower exterior door with great potential!Many updates have been made including the installation of maple floors, seismic upgrades, newer water heater, new kitchen counters, interior/exterior paint, newer roof/gutters and electrical. Easy off-street parking with a double-car carport and driveway.
Confidential Remarks: Bed/Bath/sqft info per 2012 appraisal and differs from public record.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Brian W McCarthy - 510-854-8066 - Nestled on a quiet, winding, road just minutes down the Montclair Steps to Montclair Village sits this wonderful, cared for home.  Having no home directly across from you allows for a unique and stunning view of Lake Merritt, Alameda, SF Bay & Mt. Tam.  You will instantly have your breath taken away when you gaze out the oversized picture windows throughout the home.  A thoughtfully designed single level home, you enter a living room perfectly situated to take in the view.  Then pass by an updated kitchen with views of the outdoor patio and gardens, and then to the star of the home, a beautiful sunny family/dining room with rust brown retro fireplace surrounded with windows to take in the marvelous views.  The bedrooms are all close to each other and they include one w/ensuite, one with garden views, and one with Bay views.  A gorgeous updated retro full bath round out the main living space.  Multiple doors to the wonderfully landscaped backyard and patios is an entertainers dream.  There have been known to be as many as a hundred friends at a time enjoying parties here throughout the years.  Above the full garage sits a wonderful studio with laundry and a full kitchen.  Exposed beams and a spectacular view finish out this wonderful bonus space.
Confidential Remarks: Offers if any to be reviewed Wednesday April 5th @ noon. Vacant, go & show!  Get up there on a clear day to really enjoy the view.  Main home is a 3 bed/2 bath, in-law unit is a studio w/ full bathroom and kitchen. The in-law unit was finished before the seller purchased the home in 1983.  Call listing agent with questions.  Pre-escrow opened with Lori Endo- ORTC Berkeley. Bed/bath count may differ from public record.  Neither Sellers nor Listing Agent has verified the accuracy of the information in any of these documents.
